content:
Hi everyone,

I'm curious if there are any tools available to convert a pretty-printed proof state back into the original Lean theorems. I find it challenging, especially when dealing with meta variables and coercions in the proof state of the Lean theorem prover. It's not a task that can be easily accomplished using regular expressions alone.
image.png

Thank you
Which theorems would you want to be generated for the example you've shown?
Shaonan Wu has marked this topic as resolved.
